member.name: T:Sudoku.Analytics.Async.AsyncAnalyzer
member.summary: Represents an analyzer that can asynchronously analyze a puzzle.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Analytics.Async.AsyncAnalyzer.AnalyzeAsync(Sudoku.Analytics.Analyzer,Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@,System.IProgress{Sudoku.Analytics.StepGathererProgressPresenter},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously analyzes the specified puzzle.
member.param: The cancellation token that can cancel the current operation.
member.returns: An object that can analyze the puzzle asynchronously.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Analytics.Async.AsyncAnalyzer.EnumerateStepsAsync(Sudoku.Analytics.Analyzer,Sudoku.Concepts.Grid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Analyzes the specified grid, to find for all possible steps and iterate them in asynchronous way.
member.param: Indicates the grid to be analyzed.
The cancellation token that can cancel the current operation.
member.returns: A sequence that allows user iterating on it in asynchronous way.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Analytics.Async.AsyncAnalyzerAwaitable.ConfigureAwait(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the awaiting rule to specify whether the execution context will be back to the previous one, instead of just using the current context, to reduce memory allocation.

member.returns: A new instance, with context switching option updated.
